customize.name: customize
customize.description: Customize bot settings for this server

customize.name: customize avatar
customize.description: Set or reset the bot's custom avatar for this server

customize.name: customize banner
customize.description: Set or reset the bot's custom banner for this server

customize.name: customize bio
customize.description: Set or reset the bot's custom bio for this server

customize.name: customize color
customize.description: Set or reset the default embed color for this server

information.name: help
information.description: View help for a command or list all commands

information.name: uptime
information.description: Check how long the bot has been online

information.name: ask
information.description: Ask Adore a question about the bot (Premium)

moderation.name: ban
moderation.description: Ban a user from the server

moderation.name: softban
moderation.description: Ban and immediately unban a member (clears their messages)

moderation.name: unban
moderation.description: Unban a user from the server

moderation.name: kick
moderation.description: Kick a member from the server

moderation.name: mute
moderation.description: Mute a member (prevents typing and reactions)

moderation.name: unmute
moderation.description: Unmute a member

moderation.name: imute
moderation.description: Image mute a member (prevents attachments/embeds)

moderation.name: iunmute
moderation.description: Remove image mute from a member

moderation.name: rmute
moderation.description: Reaction mute a member (prevents reactions/stickers)

moderation.name: runmute
moderation.description: Remove reaction mute from a member

moderation.name: timeout
moderation.description: Timeout a member using Discord's timeout feature

moderation.name: untimeout
moderation.description: Remove timeout from a member

moderation.name: jail
moderation.description: Jail a member (removes all roles, restricts access)

moderation.name: unjail
moderation.description: Unjail a member (restores their roles)

moderation.name: warn
moderation.description: Warn a member

moderation.name: clearwarns
moderation.description: Clear all warnings for a member

moderation.name: warnings
moderation.description: View warnings for a member

moderation.name: lock
moderation.description: Lock a channel to prevent members from sending messages

moderation.name: unlock
moderation.description: Unlock a channel to allow members to send messages

moderation.name: hide
moderation.description: Hide a channel from members

moderation.name: unhide
moderation.description: Unhide a channel to make it visible to members

moderation.name: lockall
moderation.description: Lock all text channels in the server

moderation.name: unlockall
moderation.description: Unlock all text channels in the server

moderation.name: topic
moderation.description: Change the topic of a channel

moderation.name: slowmode
moderation.description: Set or remove slowmode for a channel

moderation.name: setup
moderation.description: Setup jail role and mod-log channel

moderation.name: setupmute
moderation.description: Setup mute roles (muted, imuted, rmuted)

moderation.name: modstats
moderation.description: View moderation statistics for a moderator

moderation.name: modhistory
moderation.description: View moderation history for a moderator

moderation.name: history
moderation.description: View punishment history for a member

moderation.name: history view
moderation.description: View details of a specific case

moderation.name: history remove
moderation.description: Remove a specific case from history

moderation.name: history removeall
moderation.description: Remove all cases for a member

moderation.name: reason
moderation.description: Update the reason for a case

server.name: prefix
server.description: View or manage the server prefix

server.name: prefix view
server.description: View the current prefix

server.name: prefix set
server.description: Set a custom prefix for the server

server.name: prefix remove
server.description: Reset the prefix to default

server.name: overview
server.description: View an overview of the server's configuration

server.name: settings fakeowner
server.description: Set or remove a fake owner who has owner-level permissions

server.name: autorole
server.description: Manage roles automatically assigned to new members

server.name: autorole add
server.description: Add a role to be assigned to new members

server.name: autorole remove
server.description: Remove a role from autoroles

server.name: autorole list
server.description: List all autoroles

server.name: autorole reset
server.description: Remove all autoroles

server.name: autoreact
server.description: Manage automatic reactions to trigger words

server.name: autoreact add
server.description: Add an autoreact emoji to a trigger word

server.name: autoreact remove
server.description: Remove an autoreact emoji from a trigger word

server.name: autoreact deleteall
server.description: Delete all reactions for a trigger word

server.name: autoreact list
server.description: List all autoreacts

server.name: autoreact reset
server.description: Remove all autoreacts

server.name: autoresponder
server.description: Manage automatic responses to triggers

server.name: autoresponder add
server.description: Add an autoresponse trigger

server.name: autoresponder remove
server.description: Remove an autoresponse trigger

server.name: autoresponder list
server.description: List all autoresponders

server.name: autoresponder view
server.description: View an autoresponse

server.name: autoresponder reset
server.description: Remove all autoresponders

server.name: buttonrole
server.description: Manage button roles on messages

server.name: buttonrole add
server.description: Add a button role to a message

server.name: buttonrole remove
server.description: Remove a button role from a message

server.name: buttonrole removeall
server.description: Remove all button roles from a message

server.name: buttonrole list
server.description: List all button roles

server.name: buttonrole reset
server.description: Remove all button roles

server.name: buttonresponder
server.description: Manage button responses on messages

server.name: buttonresponder add
server.description: Add a button response to a message

server.name: buttonresponder remove
server.description: Remove a button response from a message

server.name: buttonresponder removeall
server.description: Remove all button responses from a message

server.name: buttonresponder list
server.description: List all button responses

server.name: buttonresponder reset
server.description: Remove all button responses

server.name: reaction
server.description: Manage automatic reactions on channels

server.name: reaction add
server.description: Add reactions to a channel

server.name: reaction remove
server.description: Remove reactions from a channel

server.name: reaction list
server.description: List all channel reactions

server.name: reaction reset
server.description: Remove all channel reactions

server.name: welcome
server.description: Manage welcome messages for new members

server.name: welcome add
server.description: Add a welcome message to a channel

server.name: welcome remove
server.description: Remove a welcome message from a channel

server.name: welcome list
server.description: List all welcome messages

server.name: welcome view
server.description: View a welcome message for a channel

server.name: leave
server.description: Manage leave messages for departing members

server.name: leave add
server.description: Add a leave message to a channel

server.name: leave remove
server.description: Remove a leave message from a channel

server.name: leave list
server.description: List all leave messages

server.name: leave view
server.description: View a leave message for a channel

server.name: boost
server.description: Manage boost messages for server boosters

server.name: boost add
server.description: Add a boost message to a channel

server.name: boost remove
server.description: Remove a boost message from a channel

server.name: boost list
server.description: List all boost messages

server.name: boost view
server.description: View a boost message for a channel

server.name: boost award
server.description: Manage the boost award role

server.name: boost award set
server.description: Set the role to award to boosters

server.name: boost award view
server.description: View the current boost award role

server.name: boost award unset
server.description: Remove the boost award role

server.name: filter
server.description: Manage server automod filters using Discord AutoMod

server.name: filter add
server.description: Add a word to the filter

server.name: filter remove
server.description: Remove a word from the filter

server.name: filter exempt
server.description: Exempt a role, user, or channel from the word filter

server.name: filter list
server.description: List all filtered words

server.name: filter links on
server.description: Enable link filtering

server.name: filter links off
server.description: Disable link filtering

server.name: filter links exempt
server.description: Exempt a role or channel from link filtering

server.name: filter invites on
server.description: Enable invite link filtering

server.name: filter invites off
server.description: Disable invite link filtering

server.name: filter invites exempt
server.description: Exempt a role or channel from invite filtering

server.name: filter reset
server.description: Reset all filters (removes all AutoMod rules)

server.name: role
server.description: Manage roles for members

server.name: role add
server.description: Add a role to a member

server.name: role has
server.description: View members with a specific role

server.name: role has add
server.description: Add a role to all members who have a specific role

server.name: role has remove
server.description: Remove a role from all members who have a specific role

server.name: role humans
server.description: Add a role to all human members

server.name: role bots
server.description: Add a role to all bot members

server.name: role cancel
server.description: Cancel a pending mass role operation

server.name: role create
server.description: Create a new role

server.name: role delete
server.description: Delete a role

server.name: role color
server.description: Change a role's color

server.name: role icon
server.description: Change a role's icon

server.name: role rename
server.description: Rename a role

server.name: role restore
server.description: Restore roles for a member who left and rejoined

server.name: boosterrole
server.description: Manage your custom booster role

server.name: boosterrole create
server.description: Create your custom booster role

server.name: boosterrole color
server.description: Change your booster role color

server.name: boosterrole icon
server.description: Change your booster role icon

server.name: boosterrole share
server.description: Share your booster role with another user

server.name: boosterrole unshare
server.description: Remove a user from your shared role

server.name: boosterrole name
server.description: Rename your booster role

server.name: boosterrole remove
server.description: Delete your booster role

server.name: boosterrole list
server.description: List all booster roles in the server

server.name: boosterrole cleanup
server.description: Remove booster roles from users who stopped boosting

server.name: settings baserole
server.description: Set the base role for booster role positioning

utility.name: alias
utility.description: Manage server command aliases

utility.name: alias add
utility.description: Add a shortcut alias for a command

utility.name: alias remove
utility.description: Remove a specific alias for a command

utility.name: alias removeall
utility.description: Remove all aliases for a specific command

utility.name: alias view
utility.description: View what command an alias maps to

utility.name: alias list
utility.description: List all server aliases

utility.name: alias reset
utility.description: Remove all server aliases

utility.name: selfalias

utility.name: selfalias add
utility.description: Add a shortcut alias for a command

utility.name: selfalias remove
utility.description: Remove a specific alias

utility.name: selfalias removeall
utility.description: Remove all aliases for a specific command

utility.name: selfalias view
utility.description: View what command an alias maps to

utility.name: selfalias list
utility.description: List all your donator aliases

utility.name: selfalias reset
utility.description: Remove all your donator aliases

utility.name: selfprefix
utility.description: View or manage your personal prefix

utility.name: selfprefix set
utility.description: Set a custom prefix for yourself

utility.name: selfprefix remove
utility.description: Remove your personal prefix

utility.name: color
utility.description: Display color information from a color code or name

utility.name: hex
utility.description: Get dominant colors from a picture

utility.name: createembed
utility.description: Create a custom embed or container

utility.name: copyembed
utility.description: Get the embed code from a message

utility.description: Set a reminder

utility.name: transcribe
utility.description: Transcribe audio or video to text

fun.name: nword
fun.description: Check how many times you've said the n-word
